jobDescription: This position is primarily for an application development & support engineer within the Content Solutions - Structured Analytics division of Moody’s Analytics. You will be an integral part of our Platform Services Team which is mainly focused on maintaining web services API and backend infrastructure. This is a very dynamic role in the sense that it will provide exposure to multiple products that are catered by ESA.  Key responsibilities include but are not limited to: Work closely with members within the team throughout all phases of SDLC.Develop expertise in how different modules/processes interact with each other.Modularize our applications using modern open source technologiesDesign & develop new functionality in the web services/backend tiers.Work on cloud integration efforts for our legacy web applications.Perform code optimization, cleanup and reorganization in an effort to make the services robust and scalable.
